title: Can Canada tell when MP Rathika Sitsabaiesan is telling the Truth or Lying?
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – Truth or Lies is what Canada needs to ask of its MPs for Rathika Sitsabaiesan has been caught red handed telling absolute fibs. She says she was under house arrest, then she denies it but not before she ensures her party’s leader makes a buffoon of himself by demanding…
